aiTools.title: AI-Powered Tools for
aiTools.description: Trasvilox combines cutting-edge artificial intelligence with intuitive design to provide traders with real-time insights, automated strategies, and seamless execution across multiple markets.
aiTools.tool1Desc: Our AI algorithms analyze millions of data points to forecast market trends before they happen, giving you a competitive edge.
aiTools.tool2Desc: Set your risk preferences and let our intelligent system automatically balance your portfolio for optimal returns.
aiTools.tool3Desc: Get instant alerts on profitable trading opportunities across crypto, forex, and stock markets 24/7.

dashboard.title: Your Personal
dashboard.text1: Access your complete trading ecosystem from one intuitive interface. Monitor live markets, track your portfolio performance, and execute trades with confidence.
dashboard.text2: Our dashboard provides real-time data visualization, advanced charting tools, and instant execution capabilities - all designed to help you make informed decisions faster.

mastery.subtitle: Join thousands of traders who have transformed their investment approach
mastery.title: Master the Markets in Three Simple Steps
mastery.step1Desc: Sign up in minutes and complete a simple verification process. No complex setup required.
mastery.step2Desc: Choose from pre-built AI strategies or customize your own. Set your risk tolerance and investment goals.
mastery.step3Desc: Watch as our AI executes trades on your behalf, optimizing for maximum returns while you focus on what matters.
mastery.description1: Trasvilox's intelligent trading platform handles the complexity while you maintain full control. Our technology works 24/7, analyzing markets and executing strategies with precision that surpasses human capabilities.
mastery.description2: Whether you're a beginner or an experienced trader, Trasvilox adapts to your needs and grows with your expertise.
